foreignData.name: Advokat der Resonanz
foreignData.text: {T}: Bringe drei Karten deiner Wahl aus dem Friedhof eines Gegners auf seine Hand zurück. Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.name: Defensor magopulso
foreignData.text: {T}: Regresa tres cartas objetivo del cementerio de un oponente a su mano. Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al juego.

foreignData.name: Partisan des revimages
foreignData.text: {T}: Renvoyez dans sa main trois cartes ciblées du cimetière d'un adversaire. Renvoyez en jeu la carte de créature ciblée de votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: "La nostra unione riaccende le nostre speranze".
foreignData.name: Difensore di Magimpulso
foreignData.text: {T}: Il proprietario riprende in mano tre carte bersaglio presenti nel cimitero di un avversario. Rimetti in gioco una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: Advogado dos Magi-Ressuscitadores
foreignData.text: {T}: Devolve três cards alvo do cemitério de um oponente para a mão dele. Devolva para o jogo o card alvo de criatura de seu cemitério.

name: Pulsemage Advocate
originalText:
oc
T: Return three target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand.  Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.

rulings.text: You can’t activate this ability unless a single opponent has at least three cards in their graveyard to target and you have a creature card in your graveyard to target.

text: {T}: Return three target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
